channel.title: (Class Suggestion) Private Inspector
channel.description:
**Private Inspector**
**Class Type:** Neutral Investigative
**Passive 1:**
Good Impression: Look like BD to any Investigative roles
**Day Ability:** (Infinite)
Private Contract: Select a person who will receive information you get tonight (You will also have it)
**Night Ability 1:** (Infinite)
Investigation: Determines the Faction of selected Player
**Night Ability 2:** (1 use)
Close Inspection: Determines the exact Class of selected Player
**Goal:** Survive until the End of the game

item.title: (Class Suggestion) Private Inspector
item.dc:creator: Margaret
item.description:
I would love to see this class come into fruition to be honest. However, the name would most likely have to be changed to go along with the kingdom theme. And the goal would most likely to find all other neutrals or survive to the end. The Unseen/BD would both love to exe you if you arent on their side. No defenses would make this a valid goal.

Read full topic
